metadata.title: CVE-2020-35850 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An SSRF issue was discovered in cockpit-project.org Cockpit 234. NOTE: this is unrelated to the Agentejo Cockpit product. NOTE: the vendor states "I don't think [it] is a big real-life issue."

criterions.comment: cockpit package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
